title: Julie's Butterfly
description: When beautiful Julietta meets aloof, handsome photographer Bastian, she immediately feels butterflies in her stomach.But Bastian has a secret: Since birth, he has suffered from a very rare skin disorder that makes him exceptionally prone to injury. His life is riddled with pain and rejection; his thoughts are dominated by self-doubt and mistrust.Julie wants to help him shake loose his inhibitions and open up to her, but can she reach deep enough to truly understand his suffering?
author: Greta Mil√°n
